item.title: MLLM-as-a-Judge for Image Safety without Human Labeling
item.description: Zero-shot image safety judgment is achieved using MLLMs and a novel method called CLUE, objectifying safety rules, and significantly reducing the need for human labeling.

item.title: Learned Compression for Compressed Learning
item.description: WaLLOC: a novel neural codec boosts compressed-domain learning by combining wavelet transforms with asymmetric autoencoders, achieving high compression ratios with minimal computation and uniform dime…

item.title: EMOv2: Pushing 5M Vision Model Frontier
item.description: EMOv2 achieves state-of-the-art performance in various vision tasks using a novel Meta Mobile Block, pushing the 5M parameter lightweight model frontier.
